description: Provides ₹6,000 annual income support to eligible farmer families in three equal installments of ₹2,000 each.
eligibility: Small and marginal farmers who own cultivable land. Excludes income tax payers and government employees.
benefits: ₹6,000 per year directly to bank account in 3 installments (Apr-Jul, Aug-Nov, Dec-Mar).
how_to_apply:
1. Visit pmkisan.gov.in
2. Click 'New Farmer Registration'
3. Enter Aadhaar number
4. Fill personal & land details
5. Submit with documents

scheme_name: PMFBY - Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (प्रधानमंत्री फसल बीमा योजना)
description: Comprehensive crop insurance scheme protecting farmers against crop loss due to natural calamities, pests, and diseases.
eligibility: All farmers growing notified crops in notified areas. Both loanee and non-loanee farmers can enroll.
benefits: Low premium: 2% for Kharif, 1.5% for Rabi, 5% for commercial crops. Full coverage for crop failure.
how_to_apply:
1. Visit pmfby.gov.in or nearest bank/CSC
2. Fill application form
3. Pay premium amount
4. Get insurance policy

scheme_name: PMKSY - Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana (प्रधानमंत्री कृषि सिंचाई योजना)
description: Enhances irrigation efficiency through micro-irrigation (drip & sprinkler) with 'Per Drop More Crop' initiative.
eligibility: All farmers with cultivable land. Priority to small and marginal farmers.
benefits: 55% subsidy for small farmers, 45% for others on micro-irrigation systems.
last_date_to_apply: Ongoing scheme - Apply through State Agriculture Department
how_to_apply:
1. Contact District Agriculture Office
2. Submit application with land documents
3. Get technical feasibility report
4. Receive subsidy after installation

scheme_name: KCC - Kisan Credit Card (किसान क्रेडिट कार्ड)
description: Provides farmers with timely credit for agriculture and allied activities at affordable interest rates.
eligibility: All farmers - owner cultivators, tenant farmers, sharecroppers. Also for animal husbandry and fisheries.
benefits: Credit limit up to ₹3 lakh at 4% interest (with subvention). 3% additional interest subvention for timely repayment.
last_date_to_apply: Ongoing - Apply anytime at nearest bank
how_to_apply:
1. Visit nearest bank branch (Cooperative/Regional Rural/Commercial)
2. Fill KCC application form
3. Submit required documents
4. Bank verification and sanction
5. Receive KCC within 14 days

scheme_name: Soil Health Card Scheme (मृदा स्वास्थ्य कार्ड योजना)
description: Provides soil health cards to farmers with crop-wise fertilizer recommendations based on soil nutrient status.
eligibility: All farmers. Soil testing done once every 2 years.
benefits: Free soil testing with recommendations for 12 nutrients. Helps optimize fertilizer use.
how_to_apply:
1. Contact local Agriculture Department
2. Provide soil sample
3. Get Soil Health Card within 3-4 weeks
4. Follow crop-wise recommendations

scheme_name: PM-KMY - Pradhan Mantri Kisan Maandhan Yojana (प्रधानमंत्री किसान मानधन योजना)
description: Voluntary pension scheme for small and marginal farmers providing ₹3,000/month after age 60.
eligibility: Small and marginal farmers aged 18-40 years with less than 2 hectares land.
benefits: ₹3,000 monthly pension after 60. Government matches farmer's contribution equally.
how_to_apply:
1. Visit nearest CSC (Common Service Centre)
2. Provide Aadhaar and bank details
3. Auto-debit setup for monthly contribution
4. Get enrollment receipt

scheme_name: e-NAM - National Agriculture Market (राष्ट्रीय कृषि बाजार)
description: Pan-India electronic trading portal networking existing APMC mandis for unified national market.
eligibility: All farmers, traders, commission agents, and FPOs can register and trade.
benefits: Better price discovery, transparent bidding, reduced intermediaries, online payment.
how_to_apply:
1. Visit enam.gov.in
2. Click Farmer Registration
3. Enter mobile number and Aadhaar
4. Complete profile
5. Link to nearest e-NAM mandi

scheme_name: NFSM - National Food Security Mission (राष्ट्रीय खाद्य सुरक्षा मिशन)
description: Aims to increase production of rice, wheat, pulses, coarse cereals, and commercial crops through area expansion and productivity.
eligibility: All farmers in notified districts growing target crops.
benefits: Subsidized seeds (50%), subsidized farm machinery, demonstrations, cluster frontline demos.
last_date_to_apply: Season-wise - Contact Agriculture Department before sowing season
how_to_apply:
1. Contact Block Agriculture Officer
2. Submit application for subsidized inputs
3. Get approval and purchase seeds/equipment
4. Submit bills for subsidy release

scheme_name: RKVY - Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana (राष्ट्रीय कृषि विकास योजना)
description: Comprehensive scheme for agriculture and allied sector development with flexible funding to states.
eligibility: Implemented through State Agriculture Departments for various agriculture activities.
benefits: Supports infrastructure, value addition, marketing, agri-enterprise promotion.
last_date_to_apply: Ongoing - Apply through State Agriculture Portal
how_to_apply:
1. Visit State Agriculture Department website
2. Check available sub-schemes
3. Apply online or offline
4. Follow state-specific process

scheme_name: PKVY - Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana (परंपरागत कृषि विकास योजना)
description: Promotes organic farming through cluster approach and PGS certification.
eligibility: Farmers willing to adopt organic farming in clusters of 50 or more farmers.
benefits: ₹50,000/hectare over 3 years for inputs, certification, and marketing.
last_date_to_apply: Ongoing - Form farmer groups and apply
how_to_apply:
1. Form cluster of 50+ farmers
2. Contact District Agriculture Office
3. Submit group application
4. Get training and certification support

scheme_name: PM-KUSUM (प्रधानमंत्री किसान ऊर्जा सुरक्षा एवं उत्थान महाभियान)
ministry: Ministry of New and Renewable Energy
description: Promotes solar pumps and grid-connected solar power plants on agricultural land.
eligibility: All farmers for solar pumps. Land owners for solar power plants.
benefits: 60% subsidy on solar pumps up to 7.5 HP. Additional income from solar plants on barren land.
last_date_to_apply: Component A: 31st March 2025 | Component B&C: Ongoing
how_to_apply:
1. Visit pmkusum.mnre.gov.in or State DISCOM website
2. Apply online with land details
3. Pay farmer share (40% of cost)
4. Installation by empaneled vendor

description: ₹1 lakh crore fund for post-harvest management infrastructure and community farming assets.
eligibility: Farmers, FPOs, PACS, cooperatives, startups, entrepreneurs.
benefits: 3% interest subvention on loans up to ₹2 crore. Credit guarantee up to ₹2 crore.
how_to_apply:
1. Visit agriinfra.dac.gov.in
2. Register as beneficiary
3. Submit project proposal
4. Get bank loan with interest subvention
